member.name: EMRSETARCDIRECTION
member.summary: The EMRSETARCDIRECTION structure contains members for the SetArcDirection enhanced metafile record.

member.name: EMRSETARCDIRECTION.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRSETARCDIRECTION.iArcDirection
member.summary: Arc direction. This member can be either the AD_CLOCKWISE or AD_COUNTERCLOCKWISE value.
